# Awesome GitHub Copilot Agents

Here are some prompts to help you get the most out of GitHub Copilot.

## 1. Suggest Awesome GitHub Copilot Agents

- For this prompt, you can ask Copilot to recommend agents that can help you in your GitHub workflow.
- Example: `Suggest some awesome GitHub Copilot agents that can help with code reviews.`

## 2. Create a New GitHub Copilot Agent

- You can also ask Copilot to create a new agent by providing a brief description of what you need.
- Example: `Create a GitHub Copilot agent that assists with JavaScript development and debugging.`

## 3. List Popular GitHub Copilot Agents

- Request a list of the most popular agents to see which ones are widely used in the community.
- Example: `What are the most popular GitHub Copilot agents among developers?`

Feel free to modify these prompts or create your own to enhance your GitHub Copilot experience!
